title.rendered: Friendship and Depression: Maintaining Friendships and How to Make New Friends

itemListElement.name: Friendship and Depression: Maintaining Friendships and How to Make New Friends

@graph.name: Aiden Simard
@graph.description: Aiden’s interest in mental health advocacy began at a young age when he conducted a study on social media and adolescent anxiety and depression. His passion continued into university, where he led a fundraiser that raised just under $22,000 in support of HeadsUpGuys. Aiden strives to live a life that encourages other men to speak out, break the stigma, and continue the conversation about men’s mental health.
